TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DependencyObject extends System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherObject

summary.span: 表示参与依赖属性系统的对象。

span.span: Represents an object that participates in the dependency property system.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类启用[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)]对其许多的派生类的属性系统服务。The class enables [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] property system services on its many derived classes. 属性系统的主要功能是计算属性的值，并提供有关已更改的值的系统通知。The property system's primary function is to compute the values of properties, and to provide system notification about values that have changed. 参与属性系统的另一个密钥类是。Another key class that participates in the property system is . 插入属性系统，可以依赖项属性的注册，并可以标识以及有关每个依赖项属性的信息，而基类可支持要使用的依赖项属性的对象。 enables the registration of dependency properties into the property system, and provides identification and information about each dependency property, whereas as a base class enables objects to use the dependency properties. 服务和特征如下： services and characteristics include the following: - 托管支持的依赖项属性。Dependency property hosting support. 通过调用注册的依赖项属性方法，并将该方法的返回值存储为类中的公共静态字段。You register a dependency property by calling the method, and storing the method's return value as a public static field in your class. - 托管支持的附加的属性。Attached property hosting support. 通过调用注册附加的属性方法，并将方法的返回值存储为公共静态只读字段中你的类。You register an attached property by calling the method, and storing the method's return value as a public static read-only field in your class. (此外还有其他成员要求; 请注意，这表示[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]附加属性的特定实现。(There are also additional member requirements; note that this represents a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] specific implementation for attached properties. 有关详细信息，请参阅[附加属性概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/attached-properties-overview.md)。)然后可以任何派生自的类上设置附加的属性。For details, see [Attached Properties Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/attached-properties-overview.md).) Your attached property can then be set on any class that derives from . - Get、 set 和清除存在任何依赖项属性的值的实用工具方法。Get, set, and clear utility methods for values of any dependency properties that exist on the . - 元数据，强制值支持、 属性更改通知和依赖项属性的重写回调或附加属性。Metadata, coerce value support, property changed notification, and override callbacks for dependency properties or attached properties. 此外，类便于依赖项属性的每个所有者属性元数据。Also, the class facilitates the per-owner property metadata for a dependency property. - 类的公共基类派生自， ，或。A common base class for classes derived from , , or . (，另一个基元素类，具有包含的类层次结构。)(, another base element class, has a class hierarchy that includes .) ## Examples 下面的示例派生自创建新的抽象类。The following example derives from to create a new abstract class. 然后，此类注册附加的属性，并包括支持该附加属性的成员。The class then registers an attached property and includes support members for that attached property. [!code-csharp[WPFAquariumSln#DOMain](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/WPFAquariumSln/CSharp/WPFAquariumObjects/Class1.cs#domain)] [!code-vb[WPFAquariumSln#DOMain](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/WPFAquariumSln/visualbasic/wpfaquariumobjects/class1.vb#domain)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void ClearValue(class System.Windows.DependencyProperty dp) cil managed

param.name: dp
param.span: 要清除的由 对象引用指定的依赖属性。

span.span: The dependency property to be cleared, identified by a object reference.

summary.span: 清除属性的本地值。

span.span: Clears the local value of a property.

summary.span: 要清除的属性由 标识符指定。

span.span: The property to be cleared is specified by a identifier.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通过调用清除的属性值不一定会赋予依赖项属性的依赖项属性元数据中指定的默认值。Clearing the property value by calling does not necessarily give a dependency property the default value that is specified in the dependency property metadata. 清除属性只特别清除任何本地值可能被应用。Clearing the property only specifically clears whatever local value may have been applied. 有关详细信息，请参阅[依赖属性值优先级](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/dependency-property-value-precedence.md)。For more information, see [Dependency Property Value Precedence](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/dependency-property-value-precedence.md). ## Examples 下面的示例循环的对象，设置了本地值的所有属性然后调用清除每个此类属性的值。The following example iterates all properties that have local values set on an object, then calls to clear the values of each such property. [!code-csharp[DPClearValue#IterateLocalValuesAndClear](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/DPClearValue/CSharp/default.xaml.cs#iteratelocalvaluesandclear)] [!code-vb[DPClearValue#IterateLocalValuesAndClear](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/DPClearValue/VisualBasic/default.xaml.vb#iteratelocalvaluesandclear)]

span.span: Attempted to call on a sealed .

summary.span: 清除只读属性的本地值。

span.span: Clears the local value of a read-only property.

summary.span: 要清除的属性由 指定。

span.span: The property to be cleared is specified by a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks A标识属性系统操作的只读依赖属性。A identifies a read-only dependency property for property system operations. 定义只读依赖属性的类不应公开此密钥的公共访问权限。Classes that define read-only dependency properties should not expose this key with public access. 公开提供的键将提供求反后的属性的只读字符公共代码路径，如果等方法或无法调用外部类或程序集，引用项。A publicly exposed key would provide a public code pathway that negated the read-only character of the property, if methods such as or could be called outside the class or assembly, referencing the key. 通过调用清除的属性值不一定会赋予依赖项属性的依赖项属性元数据中指定的默认值。Clearing the property value by calling does not necessarily give a dependency property the default value that is specified in the dependency property metadata. 清除值只特别清除任何本地值可能被应用。Clearing the value only specifically clears whatever local value may have been applied. 有关详细信息，请参阅[依赖属性值优先级](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/dependency-property-value-precedence.md)。For more information, see [Dependency Property Value Precedence](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/dependency-property-value-precedence.md).

span.span: Attempted to call on a sealed .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void CoerceValue(class System.Windows.DependencyProperty dp) cil managed

param.name: dp
param.span: 要强制转换的依赖项属性的标识符。

span.span: The identifier for the dependency property to coerce.

summary.span: 对指定依赖属性的值进行强制。

span.span: Coerces the value of the specified dependency property.

summary.span: 通过对调用方 上存在的依赖属性的属性元数据中所指定的任何 函数进行调用来完成此操作。

span.span: This is accomplished by invoking any function specified in property metadata for the dependency property as it exists on the calling .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 除了通过调用正在显式调用、依赖项属性也会调用内部的依赖项属性值是正在重新计算出的[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]属性系统。In addition to being explicitly invoked through calling , the for a dependency property is also invoked internally whenever the dependency property value is being re-evaluated by the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] property system. 当调用方法，将最终调用强制值回调你指定的属性。When you invoke the method, you are ultimately invoking the coerce value callback for the property that you specify. 通常将调用唯一的如果你知道强制值回调的存在，并且知道强制的回调的条件。Typically you will invoke only if you know that a coerce value callback exists, and if you know the callback's criteria for coercion. 最常见的方案来调用内的依赖方式影响对方的值的相关属性的类处理或属性更改的回调。The most common scenario for calling is within class handling or property change callbacks of related properties that influence each other's values in a dependent way. 有关详细信息，请参阅[依赖属性回调和验证](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/dependency-property-callbacks-and-validation.md)。For more information, see [Dependency Property Callbacks and Validation](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/dependency-property-callbacks-and-validation.md). ## Examples 下面的示例调用内用作实现的同一类上不同的依赖项属性。The following example calls within a implementation that is used as the for a different dependency properties on the same class. 这是一种常见模式引入 true 值依赖项属性之间的依赖项。This is a common pattern for introducing true value dependencies between dependency properties. [!code-csharp[DPCallbackOverride#OnPCCurrent](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/DPCallbackOverride/CSharp/SDKSampleLibrary/class1.cs#onpccurrent)] [!code-vb[DPCallbackOverride#OnPCCurrent](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/DPCallbackOverride/visualbasic/sdksamplelibrary/class1.vb#onpccurrent)]

exception.span: 指定的 或其值无效或不存在。

span.span: The specified or its value were invalid or do not exist.

summary.span: 获取对此实例的 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_clr](~/includes/tla2sharptla-clr-md.md)] 类型进行包装的 。

span.span: Gets the that wraps the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_clr](~/includes/tla2sharptla-clr-md.md)] type of this instance.

value.span: 对此实例的 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_clr](~/includes/tla2sharptla-clr-md.md)] 类型进行包装的 。

span.span: A that wraps the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_clr](~/includes/tla2sharptla-clr-md.md)] type of this instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性很有用，如果从方法返回的对象具有的返回值类型并且你想要属性系统特定对其执行操作具体取决于其类型。This property is useful if an object that is returned from a method has a return value type of and you want to perform property system specific operations on it depending on its type. 例如，它会更加高效调用使用而不是[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_clr](~/includes/tla2sharptla-clr-md.md)]类型。For example it is more efficient to call using the rather than the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_clr](~/includes/tla2sharptla-clr-md.md)] type. 便于更快的查找。 facilitates faster lookup. ## Examples 在下面的伪代码示例中，`MySubClass`可预见其他派生的类可能会更改的默认值`MyCustom`依赖项属性。In the following pseudocode example, `MySubClass` anticipates that additional derived classes might change the default value of the `MyCustom` dependency property. 类实现可以通过利用多态性确定实际的派生的类的默认构造函数值每次该构造函数使用作为派生的类 instantiator 时。The class implements a default constructor that can determine the actual derived class by taking advantage of polymorphism on the value whenever that constructor is used as a derived class instantiator. `public DOClass() : base()` `{` `__customPropertyCache = (CustomDP)` `CustomDPProperty.GetMetadata(DependencyObjectType).DefaultValue;` `}`

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance valuetype System.Windows.LocalValueEnumerator GetLocalValueEnumerator() cil managed

summary.span: 创建一个专用的枚举数，用于确定哪些依赖项属性在此 上具有以本地方式设置的值。

span.span: Creates a specialized enumerator for determining which dependency properties have locally set values on this .

returns.span: 一个专用的本地值枚举数。

span.span: A specialized local value enumerator.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A*本地值*是任何依赖项属性值所设置，而不是属性系统的其他方面。A *local value* is any dependency property value that was set by , as opposed to other aspects of the property system. 通过调用获取可用于枚举具有本地设置的属性值在实例。The obtained by calling can be used to enumerate properties that have a locally set value on a instance. 每个此类属性表示的枚举器中具有引用特定的属性的对象及其值。Each such property is represented in the enumerator by a object, which has properties that reference the specific and its values. 此方法的枚举的本地设置值可以用于优化或其他处理的本地值，如确定的哪些属性值如果它们已清除将更改。This technique of enumerating over the locally set values can be used for optimization or for other handling of local values, such as to determine which property values of a would change if they were cleared. > [!IMPORTANT] > 返回可能包含依赖项属性是只读的或通过属性系统计算中值的依赖项属性的记录。The returned might contain records for dependency properties that are read-only, or dependency properties where values are calculated by the property system. 例如，通过布局使用确定宽度的可视框架元素将报告的本地值。For example, a visual framework element that has an established width through layout will report a local value for . 如果您处于本地值以便重置它们，请检查上每个属性标识符值以便确认问题不是只读的。If you are getting local values in order to reset them, check the value on the property identifier of each to verify that the in question is not read-only. ## Examples 下面的示例循环的对象，设置了本地值的所有属性然后调用清除每个此类属性的值。The following example iterates all properties that have local values set on an object, then calls to clear the values of each such property. [!code-csharp[DPClearValue#IterateLocalValuesAndClear](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/DPClearValue/CSharp/default.xaml.cs#iteratelocalvaluesandclear)] [!code-vb[DPClearValue#IterateLocalValuesAndClear](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/DPClearValue/VisualBasic/default.xaml.vb#iteratelocalvaluesandclear)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance object GetValue(class System.Windows.DependencyProperty dp) cil managed
Public Function GetValue (dp As DependencyProperty) As Object

param.name: dp
param.span: 要为其检索值的属性的 标识符。

span.span: The identifier of the property to retrieve the value for.

summary.span: 对 的此实例返回依赖属性的当前有效值。

span.span: Returns the current effective value of a dependency property on this instance of a .
Returns the current effective value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks *有效值*是通过属性系统返回到正在请求值的任何调用方的属性的值。The *effective value* is the value of the property that is returned by the property system to any caller that is requesting the value. 有效值是具有计算参与属性系统值优先级的所有可能的输入属性系统的结果。The effective value is the result of the property system having evaluated all the possible inputs that participate in the property system value precedence. 这包括强制和动画。This includes coercion and animation. 有关详细信息，请参阅[依赖属性值优先级](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/dependency-property-value-precedence.md)。For more information, see [Dependency Property Value Precedence](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/dependency-property-value-precedence.md). 此方法将永远不会返回。This method will never return . 是用在内部，有时也通过强制回调公开的各种功能的属性系统的 sentinel 值。The is a sentinel value for the property system that is used in various capacities internally and occasionally also exposed through coercion callbacks. 如果你不确定该属性的类型应该是什么，您可以查询要确定是否有更为具体的请求的依赖关系属性的标识符返回值可以转换为。If you are not sure what the property's type should be, you can query the identifier of the requested dependency property to determine whether there is a more specific that the return value can be converted to.

exception.span: 指定的 或其值无效，或者指定的 不存在。

span.span: The specified or its value was invalid, or the specified does not exist.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void InvalidateProperty(class System.Windows.DependencyProperty dp) cil managed

param.name: dp
param.span: 要使其失效的属性的 标识符。

span.span: The identifier of the property to invalidate.

summary.span: 重新计算指定依赖项属性的有效值

span.span: Re-evaluates the effective value for the specified dependency property

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当调用、 任何关联的和适用或函数注册为可能调用该依赖项属性。When you call , any associated and applicable or functions registered for that dependency property might be invoked. 调用设置其本地值的属性上不起作用，因为本地值优先于其他属性系统输入，动画除外。Calling on a property that has its local value set will have no effect, because the local value takes precedence over other property system inputs, except for animations. 但是，您可以调用，然后调用。However, you could call , then call . 有关详细信息，请参阅[依赖属性值优先级](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/dependency-property-value-precedence.md)。For more information, see [Dependency Property Value Precedence](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/dependency-property-value-precedence.md). 调用不一定适用于许多依赖项属性的情形。Calling is not necessarily applicable for many dependency property scenarios. 如果由于任何组成部分值更改，因此失效依赖项属性，属性系统使无效，并自动重新计算依赖项属性。If a dependency property becomes invalidated because of value changes in any of the constituents, the property system invalidates and re-evaluates the dependency property automatically. 但是，仍有一些相应方案其中很有用。However, there are still some appropriate scenarios where is useful. 具体而言，你可以使用内强制值或属性更改为不同的依赖属性的回调。In particular, you can use inside the coerce value or property changed callback for a different dependency property. 你还可以使用以强制重新计算对不能实现推荐的数据源绑定通知机制 (可能是如果使用，不能从，派生或其中的数据是静态的数据类成员）。You can also use to force re-evaluation of a binding against a data source that is not able to implement the recommended notification mechanism (perhaps if consuming data classes that cannot be derived from, or where the data is a static member). ## Examples 下面的示例调用某个自定义属性，每当失效的属性的计算中涉及的属性更改。The following example calls on a custom property, whenever properties that are involved in the invalidated property's calculations change. 这是另一种方法与调用方法，因为将该属性设为无效将同时调用任何注册。This is an alternative technique to calling the method, because invalidating the property will also call any registered . [!code-csharp[PropertySystemEsoterics#InvalidateProperty](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PropertySystemEsoterics/CSharp/SDKSampleLibrary/class1.cs#invalidateproperty)] [!code-vb[PropertySystemEsoterics#InvalidateProperty](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PropertySystemEsoterics/visualbasic/sdksamplelibrary/class1.vb#invalidateproperty)]

span.span: Event data that will contain the dependency property identifier of interest, the property metadata for the type, and old and new values.

summary.span: 每当更新此 上任何依赖项属性的有效值时调用。

span.span: Invoked whenever the effective value of any dependency property on this has been updated.

summary.span: 更改的特定依赖属性将在事件数据中报告。

span.span: The specific dependency property that changed is reported in the event data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法不应通常检测个别属性更改或基于每个用例执行挂起的属性。This method is not intended to generally detect individual property changes or perform invalidations of properties on a per-case basis. 而被旨在用于修改常规失效模式中，如果查阅宽分类的属性已知的某些信息。 is instead intended for modifications of the general invalidation pattern, if certain information is known about wide classifications of properties. 例如，在更改可能的值类型中的更改，或可能与子属性，其中所做的更改是在其他引用。For example, changes in a might be changes in the value types of the , or might be subproperties, where the changes are within other references. 重写实现使用内部信息来确定属性是否为子属性，并提供适当的基类逻辑以两种情况。The override implementation of uses internal information to determine whether the properties are subproperties, and provides appropriate base class logic for either case. 一个对象的生命周期内可能调用多次。 is potentially invoked many times during the life of an object. 因此，如果你可以实现更好的总体属性系统性能重写特定属性的元数据，然后将附加或为各个属性的函数。Therefore, you can achieve better performance for the overall property system if you override the metadata of specific properties and then attach or functions for individual properties. 但是，如果你将使用此方法包括大量的值相关的依赖项属性，或如果它包括逻辑，如呈现行为，必须重新运行多个相关属性失效的情况。However, you would use this method if a includes a significant number of value-interrelated dependency properties, or if it includes logic such as rendering behavior that must be rerun for several related cases of property invalidations.

span.span: Always call the base implementation.

para.span: 如果不这样做将显著禁用整个[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]属性系统，导致不正确的值进行报告。

span.span: Failure to do this will significantly disable the entire [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] property system, causing incorrect values to be reported.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance object ReadLocalValue(class System.Windows.DependencyProperty dp) cil managed
Public Function ReadLocalValue (dp As DependencyProperty) As Object

param.name: dp
param.span: 要为其检索值的属性的 标识符。

span.span: The identifier of the property to retrieve the value for.

summary.span: 如果存在，则返回依赖属性的本地值。

span.span: Returns the local value of a dependency property, if it exists.

returns.span: 返回本地值，或在未设置本地值的情况下返回 sentinel 值 。

span.span: Returns the local value, or returns the sentinel value if no local value is set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 应使用依赖项属性的大多数典型"get"操作。You should use for most typical "get" operations for a dependency property. 不会返回很多情况下的生效值其中未本地设置值。 does not return the effective value for a variety of circumstances where the value was not locally set. 值由样式、 主题、 模板设置，从元数据或属性值继承的默认值是不被视为本地值。Values that are set by styles, themes, templates, the default value from metadata, or property value inheritance are not considered to be local values. 但是，被视为绑定和其他表达式将本地值之后已对它们进行评估。However, bindings and other expressions are considered to be local values, after they have been evaluated. 当未不设置任何本地值时，此方法会返回。When no local value is set, this method returns . 如果返回的值而不是，您可以查询请求的依赖关系属性，以确定是否存在返回值可以转换为更具体类型的元数据。If the returned value is other than , you can query the metadata of the requested dependency property to determine whether there is a more specific type that the return value can be converted to.

MemberSignature.Value: public void SetCurrentValue (System.Windows.DependencyProperty dp, object value);
.method public hidebysig instance void SetCurrentValue(class System.Windows.DependencyProperty dp, object value) cil managed
Public Sub SetCurrentValue (dp As DependencyProperty, value As Object)

param.name: dp
param.span: 要设置的依赖属性的标识符。

span.span: The identifier of the dependency property to set.
The new local value.

summary.span: 设置依赖属性的值而不更改其值源。

span.span: Sets the value of a dependency property without changing its value source.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 以编程方式设置其自己的属性之一的值，但不能禁用应用程序的声明的属性使用的组件使用此方法。This method is used by a component that programmatically sets the value of one of its own properties without disabling an application's declared use of the property. 方法更改的生效值的属性，但现有的触发器、 数据绑定和样式将继续工作。The method changes the effective value of the property, but existing triggers, data bindings, and styles will continue to work.

exception.span: 尝试修改只读依赖项属性，或尝试修改密封 上的属性。

span.span: Attempted to modify a read-only dependency property, or a property on a sealed .

exception.span: 的类型不是为 属性注册时使用的正确类型。

span.span: was not the correct type as registered for the property.

summary.span: 设置依赖属性的本地值。

span.span: Sets the local value of a dependency property.

MemberSignature.Value: public void SetValue (System.Windows.DependencyProperty dp, object value);
.method public hidebysig instance void SetValue(class System.Windows.DependencyProperty dp, object value) cil managed
Public Sub SetValue (dp As DependencyProperty, value As Object)

param.name: dp
param.span: 要设置的依赖属性的标识符。

span.span: The identifier of the dependency property to set.
The new local value.

summary.span: 设置依赖属性的本地值，该值由其依赖属性标识符指定。

span.span: Sets the local value of a dependency property, specified by its dependency property identifier.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果所提供的类型与按最初注册依赖属性声明的类型不匹配，则引发异常。If the provided type does not match the type that is declared for the dependency property as it was originally registered, an exception is thrown. `value`应该始终提供参数，以适合的类型。The `value` parameter should always be provided as the appropriate type. 异常条件可能受位于要设置的依赖项属性的依赖项属性标识符的回调。The exception conditions are potentially influenced by the callback that exists on the dependency property identifier of the dependency property being set. 否则，提供的值可能无法满足常规类型检查的条件 （例如，将字符串传递时的本机类型为 Double）。Otherwise, the value provided might be failing general type-checking conditions (for example, passing a string when the native type is Double).

exception.span: 尝试修改只读依赖项属性，或尝试修改密封 上的属性。

span.span: Attempted to modify a read-only dependency property, or a property on a sealed .

exception.span: 的类型不是为 属性注册时使用的正确类型。

span.span: was not the correct type as registered for the property.

.method public hidebysig instance void SetValue(class System.Windows.DependencyPropertyKey key, object value) cil managed
Public Sub SetValue (key As DependencyPropertyKey, value As Object)

param.name: key
param.span: 要设置的属性的 标识符。

span.span: The identifier of the property to set.
The new local value.

summary.span: 设置一个只读依赖属性的本地值，该值由依赖属性的 标识符指定。

span.span: Sets the local value of a read-only dependency property, specified by the identifier of the dependency property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当你设置由您的自定义类定义的只读依赖属性的值时，通常使用该签名。This signature is generally used when you set values for read-only dependency properties that are defined by your custom classes. 通常情况下，只能从注册实现提供确定的值的依赖项属性的内部逻辑该依赖属性的类型调用。Generally, is called only from the type that registered that dependency property, which implements the internal logic that provides the determined value for the dependency property. 有关详细信息，请参阅[只读依赖属性](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/read-only-dependency-properties.md)。For more information, see [Read-Only Dependency Properties](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/read-only-dependency-properties.md). 如果所提供的类型与按最初注册依赖属性声明的类型不匹配，则引发异常。If the provided type does not match the type that is declared for the dependency property as it was originally registered, an exception is thrown. `value`应该始终提供参数，以适合的类型。The `value` parameter should always be provided as the appropriate type. 异常条件可能受位于要设置的依赖项属性的依赖项属性标识符的回调。The exception conditions are potentially influenced by the callback that exists on the dependency property identifier of the dependency property being set. ## Examples 下面的示例定义一个只读依赖属性，以及`public static readonly`提供必要只读遭受属性使用者和的 get 访问器[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_clr](~/includes/tla2sharptla-clr-md.md)]包装器。The following example defines a read-only dependency property, along with a `public static readonly` that provides necessary read-only exposure to property consumers, and the get accessor for the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_clr](~/includes/tla2sharptla-clr-md.md)] wrapper. [!code-csharp[WPFAquariumSln#RODP](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/WPFAquariumSln/CSharp/WPFAquariumObjects/Class1.cs#rodp)] [!code-vb[WPFAquariumSln#RODP](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/WPFAquariumSln/visualbasic/wpfaquariumobjects/class1.vb#rodp)]

MemberSignature.Value: protected internal virtual bool ShouldSerializeProperty (System.Windows.DependencyProperty dp);

param.name: dp
param.span: 应被序列化的依赖项属性的标识符。

span.span: The identifier for the dependency property that should be serialized.

summary.span: 返回一个值，该值指示序列化进程是否应序列化所提供的依赖属性的值。

span.span: Returns a value that indicates whether serialization processes should serialize the value for the provided dependency property.

returns.span: 如果应对提供的依赖项属性的值进行序列化，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the dependency property that is supplied should be value-serialized; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认实现返回`true`对于在其中一个依赖项属性具有本地值上建立的所有情况。The default implementation returns `true` for all cases in which a dependency property had a local value established on the .

para.span: 此方法的替代可能以不同方式处理特定的依赖项属性。

span.span: Overrides for this method might handle specific dependency properties differently.
